headline: Alight (ALIT): Evaluating Valuation After MetLife Partnership and AI-Driven Benefits Platform Expansion
summary: Alight (NYSE:ALIT) just unveiled a strategic partnership with MetLife. This collaboration expands guaranteed income solutions on its Worklife platform and introduces a new AI-driven tool designed to boost benefits enrollment and improve the user experience. See our latest analysis for Alight. Despite a flurry of product launches and major partnerships, Alight’s share price return has tumbled over 54% year-to-date, and its one-year total shareholder return sits at negative 55%. This sharp...

headline: The Difference Card Appoints New Board Member, Bill Golden
summary: GREENWICH, Conn., October 29, 2025--EB Employee Solutions LLC (dba The Difference Card) in partnership with funds managed by Stone Point Capital LLC (Stone Point) announced today that Bill Golden, former Chief Executive Officer of UnitedHealthcare Employer and Individual business, will join the Board of Directors at The Difference Card.

raw.headline: The Difference Card Appoints New Board Member, Bill Golden
raw.summary: GREENWICH, Conn., October 29, 2025--EB Employee Solutions LLC (dba The Difference Card) in partnership with funds managed by Stone Point Capital LLC (Stone Point) announced today that Bill Golden, former Chief Executive Officer of UnitedHealthcare Employer and Individual business, will join the Board of Directors at The Difference Card.

headline: Helping Workers Retire with Confidence: MetLife Expands Access to Lifetime Income Through Strategic Collaboration with Alight
summary: NEW YORK & CHICAGO, October 29, 2025--MetLife and Alight have announced a collaboration to bring MetLife’s institutional income annuities to the Alight Worklife platform.

raw.headline: Helping Workers Retire with Confidence: MetLife Expands Access to Lifetime Income Through Strategic Collaboration with Alight
